sn21.4:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyati, na bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti cīvarakārasamaye.
sn21.4:4.3: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn21.4:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn21.4:4.6: “idha, bhante, aññataro navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyati, na bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti cīvarakārasamaye”ti.
sn21.4:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi:
sn21.4:5.2: “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mama vacanena taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantehi ‘satthā taṃ, āvuso, āmantetī’”ti.
sn21.4:5.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
sn21.4:5.6: “Evamāvuso”ti kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn21.4:5.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ bhikkhuṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn21.4:5.9: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyasi, na bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karosi cīvarakārasamaye”ti?
sn21.4:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn21.4:6.2: “mā kho tumhe, bhikkhave, etassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyittha.
sn21.4:6.3: Eso kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
sn21.4:7.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
